feed.title: Republic Journal - Founder resources
feed.description: Learn more about fundraising and entrepreneurship

entry.title: Celebrating 305 day with Republic Cities Miami
entry.summary: Republic Cities is launching in Miami, FL to celebrate the powerful innovation ecosystem of greater Miami! Join us to learn why Miami is becoming a hub of innovation and entrepreneurship, and meet some of the young companies leading the way.

entry.title: Pitching to angel investors
entry.summary: What’s the best way for founders to meet and pitch angel investors? Here’s a basic overview with tips on how to find and pitch to angel investors.

entry.title: Introducing Social Capital by Republic — smart money at scale
entry.summary: Collaborate with your Republic investors to bring additional value to your business.

entry.title: Angel investors vs venture capitalists. What’s best for a startup?
entry.summary: Many companies seek financing to fund business growth. If you’re seeking funding, this article explains the differences and funding approaches between angel investors and VCs.

entry.title: Crowdfunding pros and cons: which avenue is best?
entry.summary: Know your options so that you can stand out, execute and ensure your best chance at crowdfunding success. Here’s a really simple guide.

entry.title: How to raise money for your business: The old vs the new
entry.summary: Funding startups is never easy. But thanks to a greater number of people getting in on the investment game, there are more avenues for finding investors today. Read our guide to get started.

entry.title: How to find angel investors for your startup
entry.summary: Finding angel investors for your startup is easier than ever today. Read our guide to get started.

entry.title: Top 14 fundraising ideas for your startup
entry.summary: Looking to find new investors for your startup or business? Here we list 14 time-tested fundraising ideas to help you find the right investors.

entry.title: 14 ways to find new investors for your business
entry.summary: Looking to find new investors for your startup or business? Here we list 14 time-tested methods to find the right investors for you.

entry.title: What is an angel investor?
entry.summary: So what is an angel investor, anyway? In this article we explain everything you need to know about these startup investors.
